::: MEGATRON looks down at himself. He wasnt that damaged, nor was RAT TRAP. 
::::

::: MEGATRON ::: RAT TRAP! Come, we need to blow the Arc apart now before the 
battle is over!

::: RAT TRAP ::: Ah, no. I dont think so boss. Im not-

::: MEGATRON blasts Rat Trap in the chest ::: Fine, I shall go alone. Anix, 
take the ship and begin an arial assult of the arc!

::: He tranforms and blasts off to infiltrate the arc :::

~~~~~~~~~~

::: TRANSANULAS broke out of his trance ::: Wh-what? Where will we go? I dont 
know.....

::: He thought a moment :::

::: Looking about he continued ::: We can go to Megatron I suppose. When the 
time is right I can kill him and then yo can take control of his group. That 
sound good? Or do you have a better idea?

~~~~~~~~~~~~

::: HELL BEAST dodged Iron Raptor attack, taking minor damage. He then turns 
to see the shields down. ::::

:: :HELL BEAST ::: Excellent! GREMLIN, JACKLE, BLACK ARACNIA! Go!

::: The three Predacons pushed forward, dodging attacks and making it to the 
entry way of the Arc. JACKLE sprayed a lasrer, cutting a hole i nthe main 
door. They began to enter when MEGATRON pushed them from behinde ::::

::: MEGATRON ::: Oh no you dont!

::: With a quick blast, he sends the Predacons into the Arc, and then 
follows. Now, within the arc they must take out the internal defences...and 
any Maximal within. ::::

~ sorry if this seems to be moding but im trying to keep the stroy going and 
i dont want to focus entirely on fighting ~
